title: Process a Property Tax Abatement
description: A senior citizen is applying for a property tax abatement (reduction) based on their age and income.

tasks.description: Receive the abatement application and supporting documents (proof of age and income).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the complete application package.

tasks.description: Verify that the applicant meets the eligibility requirements for the abatement program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the applicant's age and income are within the program limits.

tasks.description: Approve the abatement and apply the reduction to the citizen's property tax bill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent approves the application and the system recalculates the tax bill at the lower amount.
